mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.cust_global_id globalId, t.project_id projectId, t.`name`, t.phone mobile, t.`status`, t.pic_url pic, t.oem_code oemCode FROM ( SELECT p.id, p.cust_global_id, p.project_id, p.`name`, p.phone, p.`status`, p.pic_url, p.oem_code FROM t_proprietor p UNION SELECT r.id, r.cust_global_id, r.project_id, r.`name`, r.mobile, r.`status`, r.pic, r.oem_code FROM t_resident r ) t where t.cust_global_id = #{custGlobalId}
